title.rendered: Why Small Businesses Hate Google+ Local (Comigraphic)

content.rendered:
If you enjoyed this, then you are going to love the following events…

Sept 28th Getlisted.org Local University in Minneapolis 

Oct 1st      SMX + Getlisted.org Local University ADVANCED (only 5 tickets left)

Oct 2nd    Getlisted.org Local University in Westchester

 

Thumbnail Image

Feel free to learn more about me by checking out my Google+ Profile: +Mike Ramsey
